General_Description: '''Red Sails, Dead Sailors''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "[[Athens|Athenian]] [[ship]]s must maintain control of the sea."
Section_Outcome: Kassandra destroyed [[Sparta]]n ships all over [[Greece]], and was rewarded for doing so.
Section_Behind_the_scenes: This very same contract appears also under the names [[Lakonian Vessels]] and [[The Spartan Attempt]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
